most_active_tickets.title: Pieces for developers GUI is upside down on Ubuntu 24.04

common_issues.title: Pieces for Developers GUI upside down on Ubuntu 24.04
common_issues.description: Users report the Pieces for Developers GUI appearing upside down after installation on Ubuntu 24.04, regardless of using xorg or wayland or reinstalling/updating.  The issue is visually confirmed by an attached screenshot.

related_issues.title: Pieces for developers GUI is upside down on Ubuntu 24.04
related_issues.text:
Pieces for developers GUI is upside down on Ubuntu 24.04
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.3.6

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Hello All, I just installed Pieces OS and Pieces for developers on My Ubuntu 24.04 VMWare image. I was able to install it but its GUI is upside down. I reinstalled it several times and update everything - no luck. I tried to login with xorg and wayland - no luck as well. Can You help me?

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0bab5b51-82c8-4872-913a-a32a063d1b9f)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions
